## EntityEventPayloads."ENTITY.SET\_MODEL\_ANIMATIONS\_PLAYBACK\_RATE" property

Emitted when the playback rate of the entity's model animations is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[EntityEvent.SET_MODEL_ANIMATIONS_PLAYBACK_RATE]: {
        entity: Entity;
        playbackRate: number;
    };
```
